full features integration.from sentence: We see the full features integration obtain the best performance , which demonstrates the necessity of combining all the features into consideration .

all the feature ablations.from sentence: Among all the feature ablations , the Part - Of - Speech , Exact Match , Qtype features drop much more than the other features , which shows the importance of these three features .

POS and NER.from sentence: As for the final ablation of POS and NER , we can see the performance decays over 3 % point , which clearly proves the usefulness of the comprehensive lexical information .

our input gate mechanism.from sentence: We first replace our input gate mechanism into simplified feature concatenation strategy , the performance drops nearly 2.3 % on the EM score , which proves the effectiveness of our proposed dynamic input gating mechanism .

passage encoding.from sentence: The result proves that our modification of employing question influence on the passage encoding can boost the result up to 1.3 % on the EM score .
